reporting-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office

title.narrative: China Prosperity Fund Portfolio Phase 1 Programme - Business Environment

description.narrative: Support to the Business Environment strand of the China Prosperity Fund Portfolio Phase 1 Programme expected to lead to an improved business environment for all firms. This programme is designed to address market failures and weaknesses that impede China’s inclusive economic growth and will help China’s ongoing transition to an inclusive, sustainable and productive economy. As a secondary benefit, the programmes will also produce commercial benefits for international companies through an improved business environment in China for firms and investors, as well as through additional trade and investment opportunities in these sectors, in which the UK is well placed to compete.

participating-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office
